data.message: Change the sweetners and I would buy it! Loved Coke life but that's disappeared

replies.message: It was discontinued due to poor sales.
Shame... :-( nothing to do with the complaints they got not giving the suppliers proper payment then... ;-)

Why change the sweeteners? 

It's the most researched food additive in history as is perfectly safe in moderation just like everything else. The science is clear on this one.
It affects me mentally, certain mental conditions are made worse by these sweetners.

Please explain what you mean?

All the scientific studied I have read in published journals state possible links to certain increases in physiologic compounds within the brain but nothing that would cause a noticeable effect without scientific monitoring.

Taron Ramsay  coke should have  natural low sugars and not use stuff like aspartame and actually naturally get the colour of the coke by natural ways instead of using cancer causing ammonia chemicals and methylimidazoleto to dye it anyone that drinks two cans of this a day is asking for trouble and it should be banned from consumption, the vessels it's stored and made in, I can't understand why FDA allows this carcinogenic drink to be produced and consumed it's all to do with greed and avoiding the sugar tax it will have stuff in this drink banned in the future you can be sure of that then you'll be like I drank that for all those years that's why I'm ill now
